Line 35: Line 35:
===2011 revolution===
===2011 revolution===
â
Nady joined the revolution from the very beginning, participating politically and artistically in [[Tahrir Square]]<ref name="jadaliyya"/>. When asked about what should be done with [[National Democratic Party (Egypt)|National Democratic Party]] headquarters set on fire during [[2011 Egyptian revolution]], Nady praised the idea of turning the headquarters into a centre that holds cultural activities, saying "It should be a place for workshops of all artistic fields inviting all artists from all over Egypt"<ref name="ahram2">{{cite web|url=http://english.ahram.org.eg/~/NewsContent/5/35/19486/Arts--Culture/Stage--Street/NDP-headquarters-building-what-will-it-be.aspx |title=NDP headquarters building- what will it be? - Stage & Street - Arts & Culture - Ahram Online |publisher=English.ahram.org.eg |date= |accessdate=2011-09-21}}</ref>
+
Nady joined the revolution from the very beginning, participating politically and artistically in [[Tahrir Square]]<ref name="jadaliyya"/>.
  +   +
===Post-2011 revolution===
  +
When asked about what should be done with [[National Democratic Party (Egypt)|National Democratic Party]] headquarters set on fire during [[2011 Egyptian revolution]], Nady praised the idea of turning the headquarters into a centre that holds cultural activities, saying "It should be a place for workshops of all artistic fields inviting all artists from all over Egypt"<ref name="ahram2">{{cite web|url=http://english.ahram.org.eg/~/NewsContent/5/35/19486/Arts--Culture/Stage--Street/NDP-headquarters-building-what-will-it-be.aspx |title=NDP headquarters building- what will it be? - Stage & Street - Arts & Culture - Ahram Online |publisher=English.ahram.org.eg |date= |accessdate=2011-09-21}}</ref>
